name: Modi For India
description:
Modi for India is an endless runner game where you can select Modi’s different avatars and start run through many villages! Avoid obstacles by changing the path, jumping and sliding with simple swipe controls.

Collect as many lotus as possible and you can use them for unlocking Modi’s avatars and upgrading power-ups. You can collect the in-game collectible power-ups like a magnet which will grab all the lotus on your path and helicopter where you can fly away for a certain distance.

The game will also showcase the achievements of Sri. Narendra Modi as prime minister of India.

Modi fans can enjoy the fun running style of Modi with the best cartoon style environment. Real village theme with real village characters brings the perfect blend of Indian village tradition. The game will progress as you keep playing, run as much as possible!

Are you now ready to be a part of Modi for India 2019? Be as Modi for little time and keep run!!
